title: You are solely responsible for claims made against the service and agree to indemnify and hold harmless the service.

tosdr.case: You are solely responsible for claims made against the service and agree to indemnify and hold harmless the service.
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users unless you are in Europe) state, "You agree to indemnify and hold each of Brainly, its subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, directors, employees and independent contractors, and any third parties providing content or services included in the Brainly Services or your Brainly Subscription, harmless from any claim or demand (including, but not limited to, reasonable legal fees) made by any third party due to or arising out of your use of the Brainly Services or your Brainly Subscription."
